abstract: AT&T is backing a new group to look at online privacy. Will the battle against Google undercut an important discussion?
snippet: AT&T is backing a new group to look at online privacy. Will the battle against Google undercut an important discussion?
lead_paragraph: When I first read about the formation of a new privacy think tank in Washington financed initially by AT&T, my first instinct was to see it in light of the company’s battle against Google. And I do think that is part of the story, but I also think the new group has the potential to do some real good.

headline.main: Does AT&T’s Newfound Interest in Privacy Hurt Google?
